First layer of AIRism Mesh is smooth and highly breathable.
Second layer cuts up to 99% of particles such as bacteria and pollen.
Third layer uses the same AIRism Mesh as the first layer for improved breathability.

- Cut for maximum freedom of movement and comfort.
items.name: MEN Oversized Hooded Jacket
items.shortDescription: Clever details protect you from the elements. Fabric and cut carefully designed for comfort.

items.composition: Shell: 67% Polyester, 14% Cotton, 12% Elastomultiester, 7% Linen/ Lining: 67% Polyester, 14% Cotton, 12% Elastomultiester, 7% Linen
items.longDescription:
The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.

- Unlined jacket for easy layering.
- Comfortable straight boxy cut with a relaxed fit at the shoulders.
- Soft construction makes it as comfy as a shirt jacket.
- Convenient pockets.
items.name: MEN U Tailored Jacket
items.shortDescription: Lightweight fabric and a relaxed cut. A comfortable jacket that slips on like a shirt.

items.longDescription:
The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.

- Cotton-polyester blend gabardine fabric.

- Comfortable fit at the shoulders.
- The roomy cut is perfect for layering.

items.shortDescription: A classic coat designed for comfort and easy movement.

items.composition: Shell: 100% Polyamide/ Body Lining: 65% Polyester, 35% Cotton/ Sleeve Lining: 100% Polyester
items.longDescription:
The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.

- Specially processed 100% nylon fabric.
- Traditional design with a crinkled texture adding a modern touch.
- Longer length and oversized cut for easy layering over any top.

items.shortDescription: A trench coat with distinctive details. In an versatile oversized cut.

UNIQLO’s Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.
